lines: Basis: Reaction to a specific traumatic event
Use case: Trauma exposure, disasters, accidents, violence, medical trauma
Please think about one specific stressful or traumatic event.
Below are statements describing how people sometimes react after such events.
Choose how much each statement applied to you during the past 7 days.
Response Options & Weights (Same for ALL Questions)
•  0 – This did not apply to me at all.
•  1 – This applied to me a little bit.
•  3 – This applied to me quite a bit.
•  0 – I did not have unwanted memories of the event.
•  1 – I had unwanted memories a little bit.
•  3 – I had unwanted memories quite a bit.
•  0 – I did not have disturbing dreams about the event.
•  1 – I had disturbing dreams a little bit.
•  3 – I had disturbing dreams quite a bit.
Q3. Feeling like the event was happening again
•  0 – I did not feel like the event was happening again.
•  1 – I felt this a little bit.
•  3 – I felt this quite a bit.
Q4. Strong emotional reactions to reminders
•  1 – Reminders upset me a little bit.
•  3 – Reminders upset me quite a bit.
•  0 – I had no physical reactions to reminders.
Q6. Avoiding thoughts about the event
•  0 – I did not avoid thinking about the event.
•  1 – I avoided thinking about it a little bit.
•  2 – I avoided thinking about it moderately.
•  3 – I avoided thinking about it quite a bit.
•  4 – I avoided thinking about it extremely.
•  1 – I avoided reminders a little bit.
•  3 – I avoided reminders quite a bit.
•  0 – I did not feel emotionally numb.
•  1 – I felt emotionally numb a little bit.
•  3 – I felt emotionally numb quite a bit.
•  0 – I did not lose interest in activities.
•  1 – I lost interest a little bit.
•  3 – I lost interest quite a bit.
•  0 – I did not feel detached from others.
•  1 – I felt detached a little bit.
•  3 – I felt detached quite a bit.
•  0 – I could experience positive emotions normally.
Q12. Trying not to talk about the event
•  0 – I did not avoid talking about the event.
•  1 – I avoided talking about it a little bit.
•  2 – I avoided talking about it moderately.
•  3 – I avoided talking about it quite a bit.
•  4 – I avoided talking about it extremely.
Q13. Trouble falling or staying asleep
•  0 – I had no sleep problems related to the event.
•  0 – I was not irritable or angry.
•  1 – I was irritable a little bit.
•  3 – I was irritable quite a bit.
Q16. Being overly alert or watchful
Q17. Feeling jumpy or easily startled
•  1 – I was jumpy a little bit.
•  3 – I was jumpy quite a bit.
•  0 – I did not have bodily stress reactions.
•  1 – I felt tense a little bit.
•  3 – I felt tense quite a bit.
•  0 – I did not avoid emotional closeness.
•  1 – I avoided it a little bit.
•  3 – I avoided it quite a bit.
Q21. Intrusive thoughts when trying not to think
Q22. Strong emotional waves related to the event
•  0 – I did not have strong emotional waves.
Total Score = Sum of all 22 items
